item.title: How to add YAML highlight in Highlight.js?
item.author: Author
item.description: Haters gonna hate YAML, thats for sure. I am on the other hand in love with YAML; when one have to manually write/append config files I find YAML easier than JSON (and you have comments too). Ansible, various static-site-generators and quite a lot of opensource tools use YAML syntax for the configuration purposes. But still, YAML syntax highlighting is not a part of the Common languages shipped with highlight.js compiled package.
